DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate long-term safety performance neurostimulation treatment intractable chronic migraine well detect infrequent complication problem apparent `` real-world '' practice
DOC.brief_title: Peripheral Nerve Stimulation Registry Intractable Migraine Headache
DOC.criteria: Patient 18 year age old . Patient sign receive copy Informed Consent form ; Patient implant St. Jude Medical CE approve implantable neurostimulation system treatment intractable chronic migraine : Patient diagnose chronic migraine ( 15 day per month headache last least 4 hour per day ) Patient fail three preventative drug treatment migraine Patient least moderate disability determine use validated migraine disability instrument [ e.g. , MIDAS > 11 HIT6 > 56 ]
